    patient: Patient,
    doctor: Doctor,
    time: java.time.LocalDateTime
): Either[String, Appointment] =
  if time.isAfter(java.time.LocalDateTime.now) then
    Right(Appointment(patient.id, doctor.id, time, None))
  else
    Left(s"Cannot schedule appointment in the past: $time")

)

    Right(Appointment(req.patientId, req.doctorId, req.requestedTime, None))
  else
    Left("Requested appointment time is in the past.")

case class GpsPoint(lat: Double, lon: Double)
def parseGps(input: String): Either[String, GpsPoint] =
  input.split(",").toList match
    case latStr :: lonStr :: Nil =>
      for
        lat <- scala.util.Try(latStr.toDouble).toEither.left.map(_ => "Invalid lat")
        lon <- scala.util.Try(lonStr.toDouble).toEither.left.map(_ => "Invalid lon")
      yield GpsPoint(lat, lon)
    case _ => Left("Bad GPS input format")

def safeDriverStatus(status: String): Option[Boolean] =

    case "busy" => Some(false)
    case _ => None

case class DispatchError(msg: String)
def dispatchRide(driverOpt: Option[Driver], request: RideRequest): Either[DispatchError, RideAssignment] =
  driverOpt match
    case Some(driver) if driver.available => Right(RideAssignment(driver, request))
    case Some(_) => Left(DispatchError("Driver not available"))
    case None => Left(DispatchError("No suitable driver found"))

def cancelRide(rides: Map[String, RideAssignment], rideId: String): Option[Map[String, RideAssignment]] =
  rides.get(rideId).map(_ => rides - rideId)

  assignment match
    case Right(a) => DispatchLog(s"Assigned driver ${a.driver.id}", System.currentTimeMillis())
    case Left(err) => DispatchLog(s"Dispatch failed: ${err.msg}", System.currentTimeMillis())

    .map(_.product.name)

def removeStock(id: String, amount: Int, inventory: WarehouseInventory): Either[String, WarehouseInventory] =
  inventory.items.get(id) match
    case Some(item) if item.quantity >= amount =>
      Right(WarehouseInventory(inventory.items.updated(id, item.copy(quantity = item.quantity - amount))))
    case Some(_) => Left("Not enough stock to remove")
    case None => Left("Item not found")

def parseItemLine(line: String): Either[String, InventoryItem] =
  line.split(",").toList match
    case id :: name :: cat :: qty :: Nil =>
      scala.util.Try(qty.toInt).toOption match
        case Some(q) => Right(InventoryItem(Product(id, name, cat), q))
        case None => Left("Invalid quantity")
    case _ => Left("Invalid line format")

  inventory.items.values.filter(_.quantity < threshold).toList

  WarehouseInventory(inventory.items.updated(item.product.id, item))

case class PlannedTrip(route: Route, stops: List[BusStop])
def planTrip(routes: List[Route], from: String, to: String): Either[String, PlannedTrip] =
  for
    route <- routes.find(r => r.stops.exists(_.name == from) && r.stops.exists(_.name == to)).toRight("No route covers both stops.")
    stops = route.stops.dropWhile(_.name != from).takeWhile(_.name != to) :+ route.stops.find(_.name == to).get
  yield PlannedTrip(route, stops)

def parseEntry(line: String): Either[String, TimeEntry] =
  line.split(",") match
    case Array(id, start, end) =>
      for
        eid <- Try(id.toInt).toEither.left.map(_ => "Invalid ID")
        st <- Try(java.time.LocalDateTime.parse(start)).toEither.left.map(_ => "Invalid start")
        et <- if end.trim.nonEmpty then Try(Some(java.time.LocalDateTime.parse(end))).toEither.left.map(_ => "Invalid end") else Right(None)
      yield TimeEntry(eid, st, et)
    case _ => Left("Invalid line format")

def checkOutBook(isbn: String, entries: List[CatalogEntry]): Either[String, CatalogEntry] =
  entries.find(e => e.book.isbn == isbn) match
    case Some(e) if e.availableCopies > 0 => Right(e.copy(availableCopies = e.availableCopies - 1))
    case Some(_) => Left("No available copies.")
    case None => Left("Book not found.")

case class Ticket(id: String, eventId: String, userId: String)

def findTicketByQR(qr: String): Option[Ticket] =
  if qr.nonEmpty then Some(Ticket(qr, "event1", "user42")) else None

def parseEventId(qrData: String): Option[String] =
  qrData.split(':').lift(1)

def validateTicket(ticket: Ticket, validEvents: Set[String]): Boolean =
  validEvents.contains(ticket.eventId)
case class QRScanResult(ticket: Option[Ticket], error: Option[String])

def getUserName(userId: String): Option[String] =
  Map("user42" -> "Alice").get(userId)

def checkIn(qr: String, validEvents: Set[String]): Either[String, String] =
  findTicketByQR(qr) match
    case Some(ticket) if validateTicket(ticket, validEvents) =>
      Right(s"Welcome, ${ticket.userId}!")
    case Some(_) =>
      Left("Invalid event.")
    case None =>
      Left("Ticket not found.")
case class Event(eventId: String, name: String, startTime: Long)

def formatTicket(ticket: Ticket): String =
  s"${ticket.id}:${ticket.eventId}:${ticket.userId}"

def upperCaseIfPresent(s: Option[String]): Option[String] =
  s.map(_.toUpperCase)

def safeFirst[A](seq: Seq[A]): Option[A] =
  seq.headOption

def safeParseLong(s: String): Option[Long] =
  scala.util.Try(s.toLong).toOption

def decodeTicket(qr: String): Either[String, Ticket] =
  parseTicket(qr).toEither.left.map(_ => "Malformed QR code")

case class QRValidator(validEvents: Set[String]):
  def validate(qr: String): Either[String, Ticket] =
    for
      ticket <- decodeTicket(qr)
      _ <- Either.cond(validEvents.contains(ticket.eventId), (), "Event mismatch")
    yield ticket

def combineEventNameAndUser(ticket: Ticket): Option[String] =
  for
    eventName <- Option("ScalaConf")  // Suppose fetched from database
    userName <- getUserName(ticket.userId)
  yield s"$eventName - $userName"

def timeUntilEvent(ticket: Ticket, events: Map[String, Event]): Option[Long] =
  events.get(ticket.eventId).map(_.startTime - System.currentTimeMillis())

def maskUserId(ticket: Ticket): Ticket =
  ticket.copy(userId = ticket.userId.take(2) + "***")

def batteryAfterPath(drone: Drone, path: Path): Option[Double] =
  val used = path.totalDistance * 2.0
  val left = drone.batteryLevel - used
  if left >= 0 then Some(left) else None

val batteryLeft = batteryAfterPath(drone1, Path(List(w1, w2), 40.0))

    case Some(wp) => Right((drone, wp))
    case None     => Left("Waypoint not found")

case class LiveMatch(homeTeam: Team, awayTeam: Team, currentScore: Option[Score])

def parseScore(s: String): Either[String, Score] =
  s.split("-") match
    case Array(home, away) =>
      for
        h <- home.toIntOption.toRight("Invalid home score")
        a <- away.toIntOption.toRight("Invalid away score")
      yield Score(h, a)
    case _ => Left("Wrong format")

  UpdateMessage(s"${m.homeTeam.name} vs ${m.awayTeam.name}", s"Live score: $score")

def findPlayer(players: List[Player], name: String): Option[Player] =
  players.find(_.name == name)

val scorer = findPlayer(List(Player("Smith","Blue")), "Smith")

case class MatchStats(possession: Int, shotsOnTarget: Int)
val maybeStats: Option[MatchStats] = None
val shots = maybeStats.map(_.shotsOnTarget).getOrElse(0)

case class MatchUpdate(event: Option[Event], score: Score)
val goalUpdate = MatchUpdate(Some(Event(57, "Goal", None)), Score(1,0))
val eventText = goalUpdate.event match
  case Some(ev) => ev.eventType
  case None => "No event"

def parseIntSafe(s: String): Option[Int] = s.toIntOption
val minuteOpt = parseIntSafe("89")
println(minuteOpt.getOrElse(0))

  matchId: String,
  updateTimeUtc: Option[String],
  score: Option[Score]
)
val liveFeed = MatchFeed("M10", None, None)

case class ScoreUpdate(minute: Int, score: Option[Score])
val update = ScoreUpdate(77, Some(Score(2,2)))
val desc = update.score.fold("No update yet")(s => s"${s.home} - ${s.away}")

case class Penalty(kicker: String, scored: Option[Boolean])

)

case class Commentary(minute: Int, text: String)
def addComment(cms: List[Commentary], text: String, min: Int): List[Commentary] =
  Commentary(min, text) :: cms
val updatedComments = addComment(Nil, "First goal!", 12)

case class TeamStats(team: String, goals: Int, fouls: Int)
val maybeStats: Option[TeamStats] = Some(TeamStats("Red", 3, 2))
val foulStatus = maybeStats.filter(_.fouls > 1).map(_.team)
case class Car(plate: String, make: String, year: Int)

case class Location(city: String, code: String)
case class Rental(car: Car, location: Location, days: Int)

def safeAssignCar(cars: List[Car], plate: String): Either[String, Car] =
  cars.find(_.plate == plate).toRight(s"Car with plate $plate not found.")

case class RentalStatus(carPlate: String, status: String)

def isAvailable(status: RentalStatus): Boolean =
  status match
    case RentalStatus(_, "Available") => true
    case _ => false

def safeGetFirstCar(fleet: Fleet): Option[Car] =
  fleet.cars.headOption

case class Insurance(policyId: String, valid: Boolean)

def insuranceStatus(insurance: Option[Insurance]): String =
  insurance match
    case Some(Insurance(_, true)) => "Insured"
    case Some(_) => "Not valid"
    case None => "No insurance"

def applyDiscount(cost: Double, promo: Option[Double]): Double =
  promo.map(discount => cost * (1 - discount)).getOrElse(cost)
